overview: Dae-sung and Jung-won have been married for two years. They are car pooling with the married couple next door. Woo-sung and Tae-hee don't interfere with each others' lives. However, these two couple don't just share cars, they share each others' wives too...
tagline: Married couples give each other all kinds of rides.
title: Love Affair: Married Couple's Carpool
